heading: SkillShot AB
preamble: We help airlines, banks, fintechs and commerce brands move faster with modern cloud-native engineering.
mainBody: SkillShot AB, founded in 2016 by Hans Törnquist, is a boutique consultancy blending deep enterprise experience with a modern toolset—designing scalable architectures, building React and Node.js front-ends, deploying services to Kubernetes and Azure, and automating everything through CI/CD pipelines. Our teams plug into your organisation to deliver high-impact initiatives such as rebuilding airline booking and disruption flows, modernising digital banking journeys, tackling legacy portal upgrades, implementing observability, or simply accelerating an existing roadmap. If you need pragmatic senior engineers who understand regulated industries and can get things done, SkillShot is here to help.
